experience.description: Working an Account Executive, I support startups companies in their digital transformation journey thanks to the Salesforce customer success platform

I worked as Digital Delivery Consultant in the e-commerce domain. My responsibilities were shared between delivery supervision of multiple e-commerce websites business requirement analysis and cloud consulting

I worked as an Engagement Manager & Business Analyst in the fields of utilities, smart city, and transport. Part of the Center of Excellence GIS, I had the opportunity to develop an expertise in spatial intelligence problematics
